main event: Lt Col and three enlisted men observed a disc-shaped unidentified flying object near Milan, Missouri on 6 January 1955.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be about 40-50 feet in diameter,The object was hovering at an altitude of 1,000 to 1,500 feet,The sighting lasted for approximately 2 to 3 minutes,The object accelerated at a very high rate of speed and disappeared from sight,The object emitted no sound and left no vapor trail.
witness description: Lt Col and three enlisted men
